events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision involving their car on Main Street, requesting damage assessment and claim initiation.
Claim was categorized under Auto Accident following review of the description and keywords related to the car collision event.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned to the case to ensure a thorough and efficient handling of the vehicle accident claim.
Acknowledgment of claim receipt sent to customer with initial instructions and estimated timelines for the processing of their auto accident claim.
Request sent to the claimant asking for vehicle damage photos, police report, and repair estimates to support the investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including photos of the damaged car, official police report, and mechanic’s repair estimate.
Investigation into the vehicle accident initiated; agent coordinating with experts to validate the extent of damage and fault attribution.
Investigation finalized confirming the other party’s liability and verifying the submitted evidence aligns with the collision circumstances.
A settlement offer covering full car repairs and associated costs was prepared and proposed to the customer for approval.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal expressing satisfaction with the claim handling and resolution offer.
Approval finalized for the claim after customer's acceptance of the settlement terms and all required documents verified.
Payment for the approved settlement was issued to the customer’s repair service as part of the claim resolution process.
The auto accident claim was formally closed following full settlement and customer confirmation of repair and satisfaction.
Record of the closed claim was archived securely for future reference and compliance with the company’s data retention policies.
